typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 pivot(groupBy(Size),
	pivotBy(Color),
	avg = avg(StandardCost),
	columnNaming: '$N_$V_calculated',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotProduct
source1 derive(Size = iif(isNull(Size)||Size == 'NULL', 'NA', Size),
		Color = iif(isNull(Color)||Color == 'NULL', 'NA', Color)) ~> DerivedColumn1
